title: Can't login
body: My new client is just blank it's color appears but no login screen no sound no fields to enter my username &  password please guys help me

replies.body: You might be having a connection problem failing to download assets on the login screen.  If this is still happening, try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to troubleshoot and remove any blocks that would be preventing the content from downloading.  Let me know if that helps!
I have a great connection never had problems with it so the problem still persist
